channel.title: [317] Glory Online - The Next Step
channel.description:
[left]Glory ○ Online The Next Step
World 1 Stage: Beta World 2 Stage: Beta
*This is a solo project.
[b]Green = Complete Orange = In-progress Red = Not started[/b]
I am currently looking for Site/Forums Developers Most importantly I need constant suggestions and ideas for the content that will end up being used.
[/left]

The Next Step

Red = Not started

I am currently looking for Site/Forums Developers
Most importantly I need constant suggestions and ideas for the content that will end up being used.

Unless of course you mean’t solo server development side and not web development site.[/quote]
Yes, completely solo server development… I can’t do websites to save my life.

but ill keep you all posted.
